landing.title:
Your Global
Personal Shopper
landing.description: We connect buyers with trusted travelers. Buy from anywhere, and get it delivered by travelers.

infoCards.card1_description: Buyers can easily create a request for any item they desire, specifying their preferences and requirements.
infoCards.card2_description: We safeguard both buyers and travelers, ensuring peace of mind and financial protection for all purchases and deals.
infoCards.card3_description: Found an item that doesn't ship to you or takes too long? Concerned about pre-purchase quality? We've got you covered with our vast network of personal shoppers and travelers.

actionCards.card1_description: Planning a trip or love shopping? Join Shpper, pick up items for buyers, and deliver them on your journey. Turn your travels and shopping sprees into earnings.
actionCards.card2_description: Explore our marketplace where travelers share unique global finds. Like something? Theyâ€™ll deliver it straight to your doorstep.

About_Us.title: We're Here to Help
About_Us.subtitle1: Got questions, feedback, or assistance? We'd love to hear from you.Reaching us is just an email away.
About_Us.subtitle2: Reaching us is just an email away.
About_Us.action_description: For any inquiries, support needs, or just to say hello, Don't hesitate to contact us:
